verses.verse: Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O you <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak;<s%> and <S%H8085>hear,<s%> O <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

My <S%H3948>doctrine<s%> shall <S%H6201>drop<s%> as the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> my <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H5140>distil<s%> as the <S%H2919>dew,<s%> as the small <S%H8164>rain<s%> on the tender <S%H1877>herb,<s%> and as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> on the <S%H6212>grass:<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> I will <S%H7121>publish<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3051>ascribe<s%> you <S%H1433>greatness<s%> to our <S%H430>God.<s%>

He is the <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> his <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect:<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H530>truth<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> <S%H6662>just<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> is he.
They have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves, their <S%H3971>spot<s%> is not the spot of his <S%H1121>children:<s%> they are a <S%H6141>perverse<s%> and <S%H6618>crooked<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

Do you <S%H2063>thus<s%> <S%H1580>requite<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H3808>unwise?<s%> is not he your <S%H1>father<s%> that has <S%H7069>bought<s%> you? has he not <S%H6213>made<s%> you, and <S%H3559>established<s%> you?

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of many <S%H1755>generations:<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and he will <S%H5046>show<s%> you; your <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and they will <S%H559>tell<s%> you.

When the <S%H6944>Most<s%> <S%H5945>High<s%> divided to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> their <S%H5157>inheritance,<s%> when he <S%H6504>separated<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>Adam,<s%> he <S%H5324>set<s%> the <S%H1367>bounds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> is his <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

He <S%H4672>found<s%> him in a <S%H4057>desert<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and in the <S%H8414>waste<s%> <S%H3214>howling<s%> <S%H3452>wilderness;<s%> he <S%H5437>led<s%> him <S%H5437>about,<s%> he <S%H995>instructed<s%> him, he <S%H5341>kept<s%> him as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

As an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H5782>stirs<s%> up her <S%H7064>nest,<s%> <S%H7363>flutters<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> her <S%H1469>young,<s%> <S%H6566>spreads<s%> <S%H6566>abroad<s%> her <S%H3671>wings,<s%> <S%H3947>takes<s%> them, <S%H5375>bears<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H84>wings:<s%>
So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H909>alone<s%> did <S%H5148>lead<s%> him, and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H410>god<s%> with him.

He made him <S%H7392>ride<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1116>high<s%> places of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that he might <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>fields;<s%> and he made him to <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> out of the <S%H2496>flinty<s%> <S%H6697>rock;<s%>

<S%H2529>Butter<s%> of <S%H1241>cows,<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> with <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and <S%H352>rams<s%> of the <S%H1121>breed<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat;<s%> and you did <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H2561>pure<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6025>grape.<s%>

But <S%H3484>Jeshurun<s%> waxed <S%H8080>fat,<s%> and <S%H1163>kicked:<s%> you are waxen <S%H8080>fat,<s%> you are grown <S%H5666>thick,<s%> you are <S%H3780>covered<s%> with fatness; then he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> which <S%H6213>made<s%> him, and <S%H5034>lightly<s%> <S%H5034>esteemed<s%> the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
They <S%H3707>provoked<s%> him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with <S%H2114>strange<s%> gods, with <S%H8441>abominations<s%> provoked they him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

They <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to <S%H7700>devils,<s%> not to <S%H433>God;<s%> to <S%H430>gods<s%> whom they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not, to <S%H2319>new<s%> gods that <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H7138>newly<s%> up, whom your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H8175>feared<s%> not.
Of the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> that <S%H3205>begat<s%> you you are <S%H7876>unmindful,<s%> and have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H2342>formed<s%> you.
And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, he <S%H5006>abhorred<s%> them, because of the <S%H3707>provoking<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and of his <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from them, I will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> their <S%H319>end<s%> shall be: for they are a very <S%H8419>fraudulent<s%> <S%H1755>generation,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> in whom is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H529>faith.<s%>

They have moved me to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with that which is not <S%H410>God;<s%> they have provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>vanities:<s%> and I will move them to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with those which are not a <S%H5971>people;<s%> I will provoke them to anger with a <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

For a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> to the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>hell,<s%> and shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with her <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and set on <S%H3857>fire<s%> the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
I will <S%H5595>heap<s%> <S%H7451>mischiefs<s%> on them; I will <S%H3615>spend<s%> my <S%H2671>arrows<s%> on them.

They shall be <S%H4198>burnt<s%> with <S%H7457>hunger,<s%> and <S%H3898>devoured<s%> with burning <S%H7565>heat,<s%> and with <S%H4815>bitter<s%> <S%H6986>destruction:<s%> I will also <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of <S%H929>beasts<s%> on them, with the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of <S%H2119>serpents<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H2351>without,<s%> and <S%H367>terror<s%> <S%H2315>within,<s%> shall <S%H7921>destroy<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> the <S%H970>young<s%> man and the <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> the <S%H3243>suckling<s%> also with the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7872>gray<s%> hairs.
I <S%H559>said,<s%> I would <S%H6284>scatter<s%> them into <S%H6284>corners,<s%> I would make the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from among <S%H582>men:<s%>

Were it not that I <S%H1481>feared<s%> the <S%H3708>wrath<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> should <S%H5234>behave<s%> themselves <S%H5234>strangely,<s%> and <S%H6435>lest<s%> they should <S%H559>say,<s%> Our <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>high,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this.<s%>
For they are a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6>void<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H8394>understanding<s%> in them.
O that they were <S%H2449>wise,<s%> that they <S%H7919>understood<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> that they would <S%H995>consider<s%> their <S%H319>latter<s%> end!

<S%H349>How<s%> should <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> to <S%H5127>flight,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> their <S%H6697>Rock<s%> had <S%H4376>sold<s%> them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5462>shut<s%> them up?
For their <S%H6697>rock<s%> is not as our <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> even our <S%H341>enemies<s%> themselves being <S%H6414>judges.<s%>

For their <S%H1612>vine<s%> is of the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and of the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah:<s%> their <S%H6025>grapes<s%> are <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of <S%H7219>gall,<s%> their <S%H811>clusters<s%> are <S%H4846>bitter:<s%>
Their <S%H3196>wine<s%> is the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and the <S%H393>cruel<s%> <S%H7219>venom<s%> of <S%H6620>asps.<s%>
Is not <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H3647>laid<s%> up in store with me, and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> up among my <S%H214>treasures?<s%>

To me belongs vengeance <S%H5359><s%>and <S%H8005>recompense;<s%> their <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H4131>slide<s%> in due <S%H6256>time:<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> is <S%H7138>at<s%> <S%H7138>hand,<s%> and the things that shall <S%H6264>come<s%> on them make <S%H2363>haste.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5162>repent<s%> himself for his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H7200>sees<s%> that their <S%H3027>power<s%> is <S%H235>gone,<s%> and there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H6113>shut<s%> up, or <S%H5800>left.<s%>
And he shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> are their <S%H430>gods,<s%> their <S%H6697>rock<s%> in whom they <S%H2620>trusted,<s%>

<S%H834>Which<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of their <S%H5257>drink<s%> offerings? let them <S%H6965>rise<s%> up and <S%H5826>help<s%> you, and be your <S%H5643>protection.<s%>

<S%H7200>See<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> that I, even I, am he, and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>god<s%> with me: I <S%H4191>kill,<s%> and I make <S%H2421>alive;<s%> I <S%H4272>wound,<s%> and I <S%H7495>heal:<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any that can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of my <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
For I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> I <S%H2416>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H8150>whet<s%> my <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H270>take<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> I will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to my <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> and will <S%H7999>reward<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.

I will make my <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H7937>drunk<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and my <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and that with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> and of the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H6546>revenges<s%> on the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

<S%H7442>Rejoice,<s%> O you <S%H1471>nations,<s%> with his <S%H5971>people:<s%> for he will <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and will be <S%H3722>merciful<s%> to his <S%H127>land,<s%> and to his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he, and <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7760>Set<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5749>testify<s%> among you <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6680>command<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>

For it is not a <S%H7386>vain<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> for you; <S%H3588>because<s%> it is your <S%H2416>life:<s%> and through <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> you shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> that <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5927>Get<s%> you up <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> that is <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho;<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H272>possession:<s%>

And <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H5927>go<s%> up, and be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H5971>people;<s%> as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people:<s%>

<S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of Meribah <S%H4809>Kadesh,<s%> <S%H6946><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057>of<s%> Zin; <S%H6790>because<s%> <S%H5921>you<s%> <S%H834><s%> sanctified <S%H6942>me<s%> not in the middle <S%H8432>of<s%> the children <S%H1121>of<s%> Israel.

<S%H3588>Yet<s%> you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> you; but you shall not <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
